These trending jackets bring much-needed warmth to brisk temperatures, all while adding that It factor to elevate any outfit. Whether you’re embracing the mob wife aesthetic by pairing your coat with a winter dress and knee-high boots, or topping off a matching sweatsuit with equally snuggly outerwear, a faux-fur jacket is the perfect finishing touch to almost any look. And forget the usual sea of brown and black faux fur coats: Bold colorways (like red), patterns (like leopard print), and textures (from plush shearling to shaggy fibers) are dominating this season. Ahead, 24 of our favorite faux-fur coats — including plus-size options — at every length your heart could desire.  DashDividers_1_500x100 Long Faux-Fur Coats A faux-fur longline coat is the perfect luxe layer for elevated evening looks, from winter wedding guest outfits to formal nights out. Whether calf- or ankle-skimming lengths, belted or double-breasted, solid or printed, these styles are equal parts cozy and sophisticated. DashDividers_1_500x100 Midi Faux-Fur Coats A midi coat is the ultimate chameleon, effortlessly transitioning from day to night and occasion to occasion. Whether you’re after a sleek style with toggle closures or an oversized fit to wrap yourself in (or leave open to flaunt your ‘fit), there’s a hip- or thigh-length option waiting for you. DashDividers_1_500x100 Short Faux-Fur Coats For everyday wear, a cropped faux-fur jacket is your go-to for everything from brunch to the office to grocery runs. These practical buttoned and zip-up styles feel extra special with oversized statement collars — a major 2025 fashion trend. DashDividers_1_500x100 Plus Size Faux-Fur Coats The most stylish, size-inclusive faux-fur jackets are here, ready for every occasion and every length you could want. Photo: Courtesy of Reformation.

Few things manage to be as equally luxe and practical for winter as a faux-fur coat. These trending jackets bring much-needed warmth to brisk temperatures, all while adding that It factor to elevate any outfit. Whether you're embracing the mob wife aesthetic by pairing your coat with a winter dress and knee-high boots, or topping off a matching sweatsuit with equally snuggly outerwear, a faux-fur jacket is the perfect finishing touch to almost any look.

And forget the usual sea of brown and black faux fur coats: Bold colorways (like red), patterns (like leopard print), and textures (from plush shearling to shaggy fibers) are dominating this season. Ahead, 24 of our favorite faux-fur coats — including plus-size options — at every length your heart could desire. 

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

A faux-fur longline coat is the perfect luxe layer for elevated evening looks, from winter wedding guest outfits to formal nights out. Whether calf- or ankle-skimming lengths, belted or double-breasted, solid or printed, these styles are equal parts cozy and sophisticated.

Midi Faux-Fur Coats

A midi coat is the ultimate chameleon, effortlessly transitioning from day to night and occasion to occasion. Whether you’re after a sleek style with toggle closures or an oversized fit to wrap yourself in (or leave open to flaunt your ‘fit), there’s a hip- or thigh-length option waiting for you.

Short Faux-Fur Coats

For everyday wear, a cropped faux-fur jacket is your go-to for everything from brunch to the office to grocery runs. These practical buttoned and zip-up styles feel extra special with oversized statement collars — a major 2025 fashion trend.

Plus Size Faux-Fur Coats

The most stylish, size-inclusive faux-fur jackets are here, ready for every occasion and every length you could want. From extra-cropped hems and bold prints to chinchilla-inspired textures, these picks are available in sizes up to 30 and 6X.
